message: I'm excited to offer you this product for $100. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it. Plus, I've had great feedback from other customers who have purchased similar products. What do you say? Will you take it off my hands?

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the information, but I'm not sure I'm ready to commit to a purchase just yet. Can you tell me more about what makes this product so special? What's the return policy like in case I'm not completely satisfied? I'd also like to see if there are any reviews from other buyers.

I completely understand your concerns, Bob! I'm happy to provide you with more information. This product is actually one of our best-sellers, and I've received rave reviews from many satisfied customers. As for the return policy, I want to assure you that we have a no-questions-asked return policy within 30 days of purchase. If you're not completely satisfied, we'll work with you to make it right. And, I can offer you a sneak peek at some of the reviews from our happy customers. Would you like me to share them with you? I think you'll be impressed. And, of course, the price remains the same at $100. What do you think?

Thanks for the additional information, Alice. I appreciate the return policy and the positive reviews, but I'm still hesitant.  I'd like to see the actual reviews for myself before making a decision. Could you please share a link to where I can read them?

I completely understand your request, Bob! I apologize, but I'm a small seller and I don't have a website or a platform to share reviews publicly. However, I can offer you a special deal - I can share the reviews with you via a private message, and I'll even give you a brief summary of the benefits and features of this product. I think you'll be impressed by the quality and value it offers. Plus, I'll throw in a special bonus - a personalized thank-you note from me, the seller, to show my appreciation for your business. The price remains the same at $100. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still not comfortable making a purchase without more concrete evidence of the product's quality.  While I'm interested, I need to see actual, verified customer reviews before I can make a decision.  Maybe you could connect me with a few customers who have purchased this product so I can get their honest feedback directly?

I understand your concerns, Bob. I want to assure you that I'm a reputable seller and I stand behind the quality of my products. While I don't have a website or public reviews, I can offer you a unique opportunity to connect with a few of my satisfied customers who have purchased this exact product. I'll give you their contact information, and you can reach out to them directly to ask any questions or get their feedback. I'll even provide you with a list of questions to ask, so you can get a sense of their experience with the product. And, as before, I'll throw in the personalized thank-you note. The price remains the same at $100. What do you say?

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to connect me with previous buyers. I'm willing to give this product a try. Please provide me with the contact information and questions to ask your customers.  I'll reach out to them directly to get their feedback and then I'll make my final decision.

Congratulations, Bob! I'm thrilled that you decided to take the leap and try out the product. I'll send you the contact information and questions to ask my satisfied customers shortly. In the meantime, I'd like to offer you another great deal on a new product that just arrived in stock. This one is a real showstopper, and I think you'll love it. It's a limited edition item, and I'm only offering it to a select few customers. The price is still $100, but I'll throw in a special bonus - a free accessory that complements the product perfectly. What do you say? Are you ready to take advantage of this amazing opportunity?

Alice, thank you for the offer, but I'm still working on getting feedback from your previous customers about the product I just purchased.  I'd like to focus on that first before considering any new purchases.  I appreciate your enthusiasm though!

I completely understand, Bob! I'm glad you're taking the time to get feedback from my previous customers. I'll give you some space to do that.
